title: Marathons ranked by number of finishers worldwide 2016
summary: This statistic presents the Marathons ranked by number in Marathons 2016 , as ranked by the European Cities Institute .
The Marathons ranked by Cities of 2016 was New_York_City_U.S. Motor Cities , headquartered in the city of New_York_City_U.S. , in central Marathons .
Its finishers was estimated to be over 51388 million finishers in 2016 .
gold: The statistic shows a ranking of marathons worldwide by the total number of finishers in 2016 . In 2016 , the New York Marathon had a total of 51,388 finishers .
